app.name: Auto-Assigner
app.short_description: Assigns tickets to viewing user if ticket and user have same group.

groups.label: Auto-Assign Groups
groups.helpText: Comma-separated list of group names and/or ids that will auto-assign on view.

exactmatch.label: Match user groups exactly
exactmatch.helpText: If true, tickets will only auto-assign if the ticket group and user group are identical. (Useful to avoid assigning tickets to non-agent users such as QA or Training.)
